original_title: This Day’s Madness did prepare Tomorrow’s Silence
overview: There are two women. Or there were two women. Or there will be two women. One of them is here today. No one knows about tomorrow. There is one river, there are two oceans, three registers, four velocities, five planes of time, six expanses of space, seven ways to listen. Time is measured out but each interval has its own Eternity. - David Gatten and Ashley West
title: This Day’s Madness did prepare Tomorrow’s Silence
